entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Loop representation, EH, and dominators, on x86 #84222
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Expose WASM File System API's in dotnet.js #84218
  • How to get the byte pointer / a byte span to the data of an boxed object? #84209
  • X509Chain does not populate ChainElements (Android) #84202
  • GC.GetConfigurationVariables() not respecting "System.GC.HighMemoryPercent" #84198
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Unroll SequenceEqual for u8 literals #82474
    8.0.0
  • Remove GT_ADDR nodes #11057
    8.0.0
  • Test and verify OpenSSL 3.1 support #84021
  • Guid.Parse issue #84194
    8.0.0
  • Wrong cancellation token raised by `StreamPipeReader.ReadAsync` and `ReadAtLeastCore` #83885
  • MacOS: Switch to PersistKeySet on X509Certificate2Collection.Import() causes failure on MacOS (Windows and Linux work fine) #80396
  • [Performance] XmlSerializationWriter.WriteTypedPrimitive is converting primitive types to string before writing them to the XmlWriter #76434
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Delete `GT_OBJ` #84221
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Refine BBF_GC_SAFE_POINT handling in reachability computation #84220
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix parallel SuperPMI output handling #84219
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete `GTF_BLK_VOLATILE` and `GTF_BLK_UNALIGNED` #84217
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Refine BBF_GC_SAFE_POINT handling in reachability computation #84215
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Don't publish the aot-instances.dll assembly, its not needed a… #84214
    area-Build-mono
  • Eliminate bound checks for "arr[arr.Length - cns]" #84213
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete `gtGetStructHandle` and friends #84212
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve Guid.Parse for input without whitespaces #84210
    needs-area-label
  • Use underlying type converter for nullable type #84208
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Simplify numasupport #84207
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Split Rank1 MdArray allocation into a separate helper #84205
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [PERF] Enable daily perf runs on cloud VMs #84203
    area-Infrastructure
  • Correctly display the GCSettings specified in the runtimeconfig json via the GC Configuration API Call #84201
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Delete dead code #84197
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Use FastAllocateString in InvariantModeCasing #84206
    area-System.Globalization
  • Disallow the `InitObj` form for SIMD types #84211
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete `GT_ADDR` #84147
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve reachability sets computation #84204
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Address timeouts in merged test groups #84193
    test-bug, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Improve XmlSerializationWriter.WriteTypedPrimitive #76436
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Improve Guid.Parse for invalid input #84200
    needs-area-label
  • Preserve OCE.CancellationToken in ReadAtLeastAsync of StreamPipeReader #83926
    area-System.IO.Pipelines, community-contribution
  • Optimization on LinearScan::buildPhysRegRecords #83862
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve Binary Xml (XmlDictionaryWriter) performance #71478
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Reverting: Set AssemblyName.ProcessorArchitecture for compatibility (#80581) #84028
    area-System.Reflection
  • Initial step for adding AssemblyBuilder.Save implementation #83554
    area-System.Reflection.Emit

Updated

  • Always create loop pre headers #83956
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [JIT] Fix re-use val zero on GC tracking #84051
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • fuse < and > with = when applicable #78786
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2148889 #84102
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Arm64: Implement VectorTableLookup/VectorTableLookupExtension intrinsinsic + Consecutive registers support #80297
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • SHA3 #84132
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add vectorization to improve CRC32 performance #83321
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Delete `LCL_VAR_ADDR` #84185
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement proper parsing for primitives in config binding gen #84154
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Make host look for RID-specific assets via a known list by default #84100
    breaking-change, area-Host, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [Mono]: Library mode enhancements. #84165
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Update CodeAnalysis.src.globalconfig #84059
    area-Meta
  • Reduce contention for Datacontract Serialization #73893
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • Use similar types for self-referential generics instead of the exact canonical type #83995
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Introduce a diagnostic switch to turn off the use of file mapping in PE loader. #84151
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • add msquic to debug runtime on macOS #84181
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Improve XmlDictionaryWriter UTF8 encoding performance #73336
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Port Mono for RISC-V 64 Arch (3/3) IL Lowering & Outputting #83716
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Stop excluding existing files from CORE_ROOT generation #84195
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Allow multiple EventCounters sessions and make sure EventListeners always send a Disable command #82970
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Build on CBL-mariner host with rootfs #84148
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
